featuredProjectsData.title: Space Tourism
featuredProjectsData.description: Responsive multipage website intended to promote space tourism. It provides information on the destinations, crew members and technologies involved.

featuredProjectsData.title: Le Hangar
featuredProjectsData.description: Single page live website created for a hair salon. It provides links and informations to potential customers for this salon

featuredProjectsData.title: Component library
featuredProjectsData.description: A custom component library built in React and hosted on NPM. Displays user data on a table with reordering functionalities

featuredProjectsData.title: Kasa
featuredProjectsData.description: Multipage website built in React presenting apartments and host informations. Showcassing React Router with url error handling

featuredProjectsData.title: Fisheye
featuredProjectsData.description: Multipage website built using vanilla JavaScript to showcase photographers and their works. Includes a hashtag filtering system, like system and modal windows
